snippet: In “House of Lies,” the new Showtime comedy, Don Cheadle leads a team of amoral management consultants selling their services to venal and stupid corporate executives.
abstract: Neil Genzlinger reviews Showtime comedy series House of Lies, starring Don Cheadle.
lead_paragraph: In “House of Lies,” the new Showtime comedy, Don Cheadle leads a team of amoral management consultants selling their services to venal and stupid corporate executives.

headline.seo: ‘House of Lies,’ With Don Cheadle, on Showtime - Review
headline.main: Always Be Closing: The Fast, Hard Times of Corporate Consultants
headline.print_headline: Always Be Closing: The Fast, Hard Times of Corporate Consultants
